resources.string:
This application is designed to time and analyze running services on Android machines. 
 
 Developer: Lior Ben-kiki 
 Version: 0.1.4 (released 5/5/2011) 
 http://www.liorbk.com

This portion of the code is either not in the defined deliverable or is not ready for use. If you feel this feature should be included in the current build, go to http://code.google.com/p/cs444-final-android/ and initiate an issue to that matter. For direct assistance please e-mail support@liorbk.com.
